subject: Failure occurs during tests installation
msgSnippet: Hi, I m a newbie to JUnit and I have downloaded JUnit v3.7. I have followed installation procedure and I ve launched tests installation in order to check if
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm a newbie to JUnit and I have downloaded JUnit v3.7. I have
followed installation procedure and I 've launched tests installation
in order to check if everything is ok. But among these 90 tests,
there is a failure on testSuccess(junit.tests.TextRunnerTest). See
error message :

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at junit.tests.TextRunnerTest.execTest(TextRunnerTest.java:33)
at junit.tests.TextRunnerTest.testSuccess
(TextRunnerTest.java:16)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)

Can someone explain me what's happened?

Config. : I have tested JUnit on Windows 2000 Advance Server with
j2sdk1.4.0 and jsk1.3.1_4.

Thanx.

sham
